Our company's core value is simple. When we do well, we all do well. It is because of this that we believe in our employees to know what is best, and to take equal part in decisions and equal share of profits. We also believe in providing our employees with a safe and healthy work environment, and in ensuring that they are treated with dignity. We hope that our commitment to this foundational idea will inspire other business leaders to do the same.
